articleBody:
Introduction

This security checklist was created by the Liferay Team to offer another measure of protection for customer projects. The checklist covers best practices for Liferay DXP Cloud. For Liferay DXP security considerations and best practices, please refer to the Liferay Help Center.

Disclaimer: The items in this checklist are suggested best practices and it will be the end-userâ€™s responsibility to implement.
title: DXP Cloud Security Checklist
